#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define s(x) scanf("%d",&x)
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int i,j,k,l,m,n,t;
	
	cin >> t;
	
	while(t--)
	{
		s(m);
		s(n);
		
		int a[m+1][n+2];
		int b[m+2][n+2];
		
		for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
			{
				s(a[i][j]);
				b[i][j] = 1;
			}
		}
			
		for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
			a[i][n+1] = 0;
			
	/*	for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=n+1;j++)
			{
				cout << a[i][j] <<" ";
			}
			cout << endl;
		}
		
		cout << endl;
	
	*/		
			
		for(i =1;i<=m;i++)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
			{
				if(a[i][j+1] > a[i][j])
				{
					b[i][j+1] = max(b[i][j+1], b[i][j] + 1);
					b[i+1][j] = max(b[i+1][j], b[i][j] + 1); 
				}
			}
		}
		
		int ans = 0;
		for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
			{
				ans = max(ans, b[i][j]);
			}
		}
		
		cout << ans <<endl;
	}
}
